actions: Drains Heat, relieves Fire toxicity, cools the Blood and benefits the throat.
Spreads Liver Qi, relieves Stagnation, raises Yang Qi (specifically the Clear Qi of the Stomach), disperses Wind-Heat and resolves Phlegm and congestion.
With Huang Qi, raises the Clear Yang due to abnormal descent of Qi.
Tonifies Qi and Blood, raises Yang Qi, tonifies the Lungs and promotes urination.
Nourishes Lung and Stomach Yin, moistens he Lungs and generates Fluids.

syndromes: Qi, Blood and Yin Deficiency with Qi Stagnation
notes: Decoct and take 30ml three times a day.
